title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: English Literacy in Science Using AI Multisensory Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic scientific terminology and English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve reading speed of scientific English texts by 25%.
Learners can increase contextual understanding of academic terminology by 35% through VR simulations.
40% increase in reading comprehension scores when utilizing AI analysis tools

Learners will select at least three learning resources from tech-based platforms (e.g., GitHub, Coursera, Udemy), establish a four-week learning plan based on SMART principles, and achieve over 80% execution rate using a weekly progress checklist.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
